DOC.brief_summary: This registry intend evaluate clinical outcome DePuy P.F.C . Sigma PS150 RP Total Knee System . 200 participant enrol prospectively retrospectively follow period 5 year . Data collection include Radiographic Analysis , Knee Society Evaluation Adverse Events .
DOC.brief_title: PS150 Total Knee Arthroplasty Outcomes Registry
DOC.criteria: Primary total knee replacement indication accordance Instructions For Use accompany SIGMA PS150 implant . Signed Informed Patient Consent There exclusion criterion registry .
